title: Client Resolution
body: How can I increase my client resolution to 1600x900?

replies.body:
While our devs have been recently ranking up 4K support with recent patches, the recommend resolution is still set to not exceed 1920x1080.  If you find yourself running into issues, just go back in time with a config reset.  :D

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

thx for the tip but i mean the client's resolution not the game's resolution 
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Ah, you can adjust client's scaling by holding Ctrl and tapping +.
